card.name: Air Ring
card.property: The attacking player takes 1 honor from his or her opponent, or gains 2 honor from the general token pool.

alternate.name: Air Ring
alternate.property: The attacking player takes 1 honor from his or her opponent, or gains 2 honor from the general token pool.

card.name: Earth Ring
card.property: The attacking player draws 1 card from his or her conflict deck and discards 1 card at random from his or her opponent's hand.

alternate.name: Earth Ring
alternate.property: The attacking player draws 1 card from his or her conflict deck and discards 1 card at random from his or her opponent's hand.

card.name: Fire Ring
card.property: The attacking player chooses a character in play and chooses to honor or dishonor that character.

alternate.name: Fire Ring
alternate.property: The attacking player chooses a character in play and chooses to honor or dishonor that character.

card.name: Void Ring
card.property: The attacking player chooses a character and removes 1 fate from that character.

alternate.name: Void Ring
alternate.property: The attacking player chooses a character and removes 1 fate from that character.

card.name: Water Ring
card.property: The attacking player either chooses a character and readies it, or chooses a character with no fate on it and bows it.

alternate.name: Water Ring
alternate.property: The attacking player either chooses a character and readies it, or chooses a character with no fate on it and bows it.
